para: The following changes have occurred for Java WS Core:

listitem.simpara: Adjusted the default size of the thread pool used by the standalone and embedded container. By default the standalone container will now have a minimum of 2 threads and a maximum of 20. The embedded container will now have a minimum of 1 thread and maximum of 3 threads.
Refreshed version of CoG JGlobus library. Please see the CoG JGlobus Release Notes for more details.
Updated version of Apache Commons CLI 2.0 library.

listitem.para: Refreshed version of Apache Axis library with the following bug fixes:

listitem.simpara: Fault bean generation with optional primitive types
Rare synchronization problem in symbol table
Added more TESTS.pl scripts for interop and unit tests to integrate better with the Globus testing framework.
Added two new usage statistics reported by Java WS Core: container uptime and a list of activated services.
